overview_of_class: This is the second part of intermediate Swahili. The course builds on the foundation established in beginning Swahili courses. It is designed to enhance students' communicative skills and a deeper cultural awareness about Swahili and East Africa.
name: Swahili II
title: WCAS SWAHILI 121-2-20 Swahili II

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This is the second part of intermediate Swahili. The course builds on the foundation established in beginning Swahili courses. It is designed to enhance students' communicative skills and a deeper cultural awareness about Swahili and East Africa.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: To enroll in the course, a student is required to have satisfactorily completed the three beginning levels of Swahili and Swahili 121-1, or the equivalent.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
Sharifa Zawawi. 2001. Kiswahili Kwa Kitendo: An Introductory and Intermediate Course (2nd Edition). Africa World Press: New Jersey.

Sharifa Zawawi. 1998. Jifunze Kiswahili Chetu: Workbook. Africa World Press: New Jersey. Africa World Press: New Jersey.

Swahili - English, English - Swahili Practical Dictionary (Hippocrene Practical Dictionary) by Nicholas Awde.

subject: SWAHILI
